contribution_desc: System to simplify access to web-content when interacting across a larger number of devices, links between devices. Uses synchronized web history, and introduces a number of techniques and filters.
devices_included: Any screen device; Phone; Tablet; Laptop; Desktop computer
use_cases_desc: Access to synced web history across devices. Filtering and other techniques.
interaction_techniques: Access to web history across devices; filtering; suggestions; visual previews
crossdevice_def:
Cross-device interaction.
No definition, but defined through references and provides context.
